title: if you were to remove any ability from any champion what would it be?

replies.body: Yas Windwall

> [{quoted}](name=Anastaecia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vzjmXKAO,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-04-04T15:03:27.465+0000)
>
> Yas Windwall

{{champion:201}} Wall i hate a lot more than windwall.
At least the CC portion still affects Braum, unlike Yolo wall there.

> [{quoted}](name=Thę Weeknd  XO,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vzjmXKAO,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2018-04-04T16:09:23.795+0000)
>
> At least the CC portion still affects Braum, unlike Yolo wall there.

At least yasuo's wall is stationary, unlike Braums. Also if yasuo want's to use it to protect someone and he is not in front of them already he would need to Flash or be lucky to have a enemy minion wave there to reach that player faster, meanwhile Braum can just hit W (which also gives him and the ally more Armor/MR) with his wall primed.
Yeah, but Braum's isn't omni directional. Braum has to be facing you for his to work, Yas can panic and throw it the wrong direction and it still works.
And he still takes a portion of the damage, and it doesn't negates the projectiles, just intercepts it.

{{champion:117}}  Poly-morph.

{{champion:75}} wither, sooooo fucking stupid honestly, needs a higher cd late game, a perma slow this strong is really unfair to a lot of champs

{{champion:157}} E

So that he can calm the fuck down & cs like a normal person instead of infinitely dashing to his 0/21/0 death.
Any dash from every adc

{{champion:45}} R
{{champion:10}} R
{{champion:26}} R
Basically anything that is point and click and has to much impact on it.

To be fair, they are **ULTs** if they had little impact they'd feel like crap

https://pre00.deviantart.net/c006/th/pre/f/2017/223/5/7/veigar_01_by_sungben-dbjozge.png

Not little Just not too much. Not Zil's ult tho His Entire kit and base stats suffer (unlike other mages '-'){{champion:101}}  {{champion:10}} {{champion:45}} ) for that ult and they take away its w interaction. But Ezreal Keeps the Q interaction that lowers his ult cooldown because  ranged damage cant ever be broken '-' ) {{champion:222}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:45}}  {{champion:101}}
Though Zilleans ult is more fair Reviving at 20% hp Increased by bonus hp of the target than having a base and scaling with hp. Sorry but it shouldnt be more effective on squishy champions than actaully have to play in a danger zone when its already more valuable on a carry.

Yeah they are ults and should have impact **BUT** in a healthier way. I don't mind if urgot executes me with his R, I don't mind if taric makes his team invulnerable because they have counterplay attached to them (skillshot+condition, casting time+self centered skillshot).

But I mind if the highest expression of skill on an ultimate is to only press the key. 
And it feels like the enemy simply cheats by pressing R. That's why I don't like point and click ultimates, yet I need to admit that not every point and click ultimate feels that bad. Foe example Nautilus his ult feels quite okay to play against (but he has also some counterplay attached to it -> if he isn't on top of the enemy it isn't instant which means that you have time to reposition yourself)
Singed Q
Wind wall.

But honestly I'd also remove Ryze's E. That ability is just stupid.
Either Gangplank W, Nasus' wither or Yasuo's windwall.
